original_text: The horseman lifteth up both the bright sword and the glittering spear: and there is a multitude of slain, and a great number of carcases; and there is none end of their corpses; they stumble upon their corpses:
korean_text: 충돌하는 기병, 번쩍이는 칼, 번개 같은 창, 죽임 당한 자의 떼, 주검의 큰 무더기, 무수한 시체여 사람이 그 시체에 걸려 넘어지니

sentences.original_text: The horseman lifteth up both the bright sword
and there is a multitude of slain
and a great number of carcases
and there is none end of their corpses
